Names of Allah.quote: Allah has ninety-nine names, one hundred minus one; whoever knows them will enter Paradise. (Sahih Bukhari 2736)

Divine Attributes.quote: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. (Quran 2:255)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. (Quran 2:255)

Divine Knowledge.quote: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. (Quran 64:4)

Divine Creation.quote: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and earth in six days. (Quran 7:54)

Divine Justice.quote: And your Lord does injustice to no one. (Quran 18:49)

Divine Guidance.quote: Indeed, this Quran guides to that which is most suitable. (Quran 17:9)

Divine Power.quote: Indeed, Allah is over all things competent. (Quran 2:20)

Divine Presence.quote: And We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein. (Quran 50:16)

Divine Light.quote: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. (Quran 24:35)

Divine Truth.quote: That is because Allah is the Truth. (Quran 22:62)

Divine Wisdom.quote: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good. (Quran 2:269)

Divine Judgment.quote: Indeed, to Allah belongs the judgment. (Quran 12:40)

Divine Forgiveness.quote: Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful. (Quran 39:53)

Divine Protection.quote: And Allah is the best of guardians. (Quran 12:64)

Divine Sustenance.quote: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength. (Quran 51:58)

Divine Signs.quote: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves. (Quran 41:53)

Divine Oneness.quote: Your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him. (Quran 2:163)

Divine Magnificence.quote: He is the Most High, the Most Great. (Quran 2:255)

Divine Nearness.quote: And when My servants ask you concerning Me - indeed I am near. (Quran 2:186)

Divine Hearing.quote: Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing. (Quran 2:181)

Divine Seeing.quote: Indeed, Allah is Seeing of what you do. (Quran 2:110)

Divine Lordship.quote: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds. (Quran 1:2)

Divine Eternity.quote: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate. (Quran 57:3)

Divine Relationship.quote: Remember Me; I will remember you. (Quran 2:152)

Divine Worship.quote: I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me. (Quran 51:56)
